skills.name: Dark Wings
skills.description: [SP: 0][CD: 0] Use the bow to aim and shoot (max aiming duration: 3s), dealing 450.0% ATK of Physical DMG. Hitting an enemy weakspot creates an explosion dealing 600.0% ATK of Physical DMG. DMG type will auto-adapt to that of the wielder (order of priority: Fire>Ice>Lightning>Physical). The weapon active's CD and charging time are based on the shooting mode.

skills.name: Nocturnal Etamine
skills.description: Total DMG increases by 15.0%. The weapon active summons lightning balls at the target's location on hit to deal 25.0% ATK of Lightning DMG per second to enemies nearby for 5s. CD: 5.0s.
